title: Interview.Setup
body:
<<if $suspect == "Logan">>
    <<interviewSuspect InterviewSceneController Logan>>
<<elseif $suspect == "Nora">>
    <<interviewSuspect InterviewSceneController Nora>>
<<elseif $suspect == "Rachael">>
    <<interviewSuspect InterviewSceneController Rachael>>
<<elseif $suspect == "Lola">>
    <<interviewSuspect InterviewSceneController Lola>>
<<endif>>
[[Interview.Sit]]

title: Interview.Lola
body:
Why am I here?
Seriously, how? There's no way you can trigger my variable..
[[Game.Exit]]

title: Interview.Logan
body:
What is this about detective?
->I have evidence that you were behind Jacob Wright's death
    What? That's preposerous! I'll have your badge for this!
    ->You fought with Jacob on the night of his death.
        What about it? Are you saying I beat him to death?
        ->I am indeed.
            You're a madman. This will never stand up in court...
[[Game.Exit]]

title: Interview.Rachael
body:
You'd better have a good reason for dragging me in here, detective.
->The jig is up Rachael. I know you killed Jacob Wright.
    Ha, and you think I'll just confess to you? You can't prove anything.
    ->We found your rifle.
->I have evidence that you were the one who killed Jacob Wright.
    And what evidence would that be?
    ->We found your rifle.

...What?
I knew I should have dumped it in the river...
Fine... I killed him.
He just wouldn't step back on his decision. It was going to cost the company millions.
He gave me no choice...
[[Game.Exit]]

title: Interview.Nora
body:
Can this hurry along, I've got a flight to catch soon.
->I'm afraid you won't be going anywhere, Miss Hastings.
    What the hell? On what grounds?
    ->I've have evidence that you are behind Jacob's death.
        And what evidence would that be?
        ->I found the syringe in your apartment.

Damn it...
Fine, I killed him.
He spun all these lies about our future together, but he never really wanted that.
He was just stringing me along to keep himself interested.
I'm glad he's dead...
[[Game.Exit]]

title: Interview.Logan.Convict
body:
Hello Mr Rutledge.
Logan: First you come into my home.
Logan: And now I'm dragged in here!?
Logan: What is this about?
I believe you killed Mr Wright Logan.
The arguement got heated, you punched Mr Wright.
But you didn't stop there...
Logan: This is absurd!
You drew a weapon and shot Mr Wright in the stomach.
The bullet passed through the window.
And now we're here.
What do you have to say for yourself?
Logan: Detective...
Logan: I didn't kill Jacob.
Logan: Sometimes I wanted to, yes.
Logan: But you've got the wrong man.
Save it for the court room, you know what you did.

title: Interview.Nora.Convict
body:
Nora: What am I even here for? You're wasting my time.
Detective: Look missy, I've got the results from your apartment back from the lab.
Nora: What results? You've got nothing on me.
Detective: On the contrary, I've got quite a solid case for your arrest Miss Hasting.
Nora: Push off. You know nothing.
Detective: Then how do you explain this?
[[Mention the syringe|Interview.Nora.Convict.syringe]]

title: Interview.Nora.Convict.syringe
body:
Nora: A syringe from my apartment?
Nora: You do realise I work in a hospital, right?
[[What was it doing in your apartment?|Interview.Nora.Convict.apartment]]

title: Interview.Nora.Convict.apartment
body:
Nora: I..um...
Nora: I'll have you know that I..
Nora: ..suffer from type 2 diabetes!
Nora: ..Yeah, that's right!
Nora: I'm required to give myself insulin injections daily!
[[I had the substance inside the syringe tested.|Interview.Nora.Convict.poison]]

title: Interview.Nora.Convict.poison
body:
Detective: You and I know that is a bold-faced lie Miss Hastings.
    Nora: and why is that?..
Detective: I had the substance in the needle tested at the lab..
        Nora: oh...
Detective: it is the same poison that was used to kill Jocob!
        Nora: Alright...
        Nora: you got me..
        Nora: You meddling cops!
        Nora: You don't know what he was like though.
        Nora: He just chewed me up, then spat me back out..
        Nora: just like everyone else he knew.
        Nora: Yeah, I'll go way for this..
        Nora: ..but I'm sure it was just a matter of time..
[[What do you mean?|NoraConvict.conclusion]]

title: Interview.Nora.Convict.conclusion
body:
Nora: Maybe you didn't notice but Jacob wasn't a well-liked man.
Nora: If I hadn't of poisoned that bastard..
Nora: ..then someone else would have stepped up to the plate!
[[I've heard enough. You're nicked!|Interview.Nora.Convict.spit]]
